    • vector

      public Point2D vector​(Point2D target)
      This method returns the vector between this point and the target point. The vector is represented as a Point2D.
      Parameters:
      target -
      Returns:
      a new Point2D(dx,dy)

    • getPoints

      public Point2D[] getPoints()
      Description copied from interface: GeoShape
      This method return the dominant point of the shape: Point2D, a copy of it. Segment: the two end points. Circle: center and a point on the boundary (in this order). Rectangle: min,max 2 points (left-low,right-up). Triangle: all 3 points.
      Specified by:
      getPoints in interface GeoShape
